text: Ramón Pileta (born March 20, 1977) is a Honduran judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's +100 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the first round by Rafael Silva. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Honduran male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Honduras Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Judoka at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Ramón Pileta
